title: German onion tart (Zwiebelkuchen)
ingredients: ['For the garlic pastry', '200g plain flour', '1 egg', '100g butter, softened', '1 garlic clove, minced', 'For the filling', '900g onions, finely sliced', '4 sprigs fresh thyme', '50g butter', 'salt and pepper to taste', '60g prosciutto, cut in strips', '50g soured cream', '50g cream cheese, at room temperature', '1 egg', '50g grated Cheddar cheese', 'caraway seeds (optional)']
